description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. It was supposed to be a simple arcade game, but something has broken down the barriers between game worlds. Can you resolve the mystery in this revealing Breakout-style game with a twist?
description.short: It was supposed to be a simple arcade game, but something has broken down the barriers between game worlds. Can you resolve the mystery in this revealing Breakout-style game with a twist?
